name: United Parcel Service, Inc.
description: United Parcel Service, Inc. (UPS) is a global leader in logistics and package delivery services, providing a broad range of solutions to businesses and consumers. Founded in 1907, UPS has grown from a small messenger service in Seattle to one of the world's largest logistics companies, operating in over 220 countries and territories. The company is renowned for its reliable parcel delivery services, including same-day, next-day, and international shipping options. UPS has made significant investments in technology and automation to enhance its operational efficiency and customer service, utilizing advanced analytics and real-time tracking systems. In addition to package delivery, UPS offers supply chain management, freight transportation, and e-commerce solutions, catering to the diverse needs of its global customer base. The company's commitment to sustainability is evident through its initiatives aimed at reducing carbon emissions and improving fuel efficiency. With a focus on innovation, UPS continues to adapt to the changing landscape of logistics and e-commerce, positioning itself as a vital player in the global supply chain.

seo.meta_title: United Parcel Service, Inc. | Global Logistics and Package Delivery
seo.meta_description: Explore United Parcel Service, Inc. (UPS), a leader in logistics and package delivery services. Discover UPS's innovative solutions, commitment to sustainability, and impact on global commerce.

faq.question: What services does UPS provide?
faq.answer: UPS provides package delivery, freight transportation, supply chain management, and e-commerce solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UPS?
faq.answer: Carol Tomé is the CEO of United Parcel Service, Inc.

faq.question: Where is UPS headquartered?
faq.answer: UPS is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
